sections.title: Introduction
sections.summary: You will be answering questions on your thoughts, behaviors and emotions, completing game-like tasks, and providing feedback on your experience using the app.

sections.title: Time Commitment
sections.formalTitle: What are the risks of the research study?
sections.summary: You will complete some tasks and surveys today, which lasts about 10 minutes, then daily morning and evening surveys that take about 3 minutes per sitting on average.

sections.title: Payment
sections.summary: After 7 days, you will repeat the assessment you take today. After, you will email us to receive your $25 Amazon gift card.

sections.title: Privacy
sections.summary: We DO NOT collect your name or any identifying information, which is why you are given a code. Your data is kept on an encrypted database.

sections.title: Questions?
sections.summary: If you have questions about this app, please email us at rvitale@northwell.edu.
